string.message_spell_learning_bad_reference: [Spell Learning] Error learning spell,  removing entry from list.
string.notification_unknown_spell: [Spell Learning] Unknown spell in learning list - other spell mod removed?
string.notification_learn_spell: It all makes sense now! Learned {0}.
string.notification_slept_too_soon: Your mind isn't settled enough yet to learn any spells...
string.notification_moving_on: Not making any progress on {0}... trying other spells.
string.notification_impossible_spell: {0} is too difficult. Trying other spells first.
string.notification_dreamt_Julianos: You dreamt that Julianos was watching over you.
string.notification_dreamt_flying: You dreamt that you were flying over Solstheim.
string.notification_dreamt_exam: You had a nightmare about being lost forever in a plane of Oblivion.
string.notification_no_more_dreadmilk_addiction: You're finally starting to feel your dreadmilk craving wane.
string.notification_need_dreadmilk: You feel an excruciating yearning for dreadmilk...
string.notification_dreadmilk_out_of_system: All the Dreadmilk is finally out of your system...
string.notification_spell_invention_bug: [Spell Learning] Error: A spell tome in your game has no linked spell.
string.notification_new_spell_idea: An idea for a new spell came to you: {0}!
string.notification_discover_too_soon: Your mind isn't settled enough yet to discover any spells...
string.dreadmilk_feels good: Your withdrawal symptoms are relieved - for now...
string.dreadmilk_need more: You feel an excruciating yearning for more Dreadmilk...
string.mcm_option_limit_failure_always_succeeds: Auto Succeed When Max Failures Reached
string.mcm_option_auto_failure_diff: Max Skill Difference before Auto Fail
string.mcm_option_auto_success_diff: Req. Skill Difference for Auto Success
string.hint_remove_spells: Removes Attunement and Summon Daedric Tutor from your spells (if known).
string.hint_remove_power: Removes the 'Study' power from your character.
string.hint_remove_status: Removes all temporary status effects, including the mod's potion effects. Also removes the 'Spell Learning' tracking status effect.
string.hint_add_power: Adds the 'Study' power to your character, which can be assigned like a dragon shout to enable learning and discovery without sleeping.
string.hint_add_tracker_effect: Adds the 'Spell Learning' tracking effect to your character, which records spell casts, automatically removes spellbooks, and generates notes.
string.mcm_message_fiss_wait: Please wait until the next message box. Do not quit this MCM menu yet.
string.mcm_message_fiss_done: Done. You are free to leave this MCM menu.
string.hint_minChanceStudy: Minimum chance per night to learn a spell from books you've read or spells you've discovered. Defaults to 20%.
string.hint_maxChanceStudy: Maximum chance per night to learn a spell from books you've read or spells you've discovered. Defaults to 80%.
string.hint_minChanceDiscover: Minimum chance per night to discover a new spell, adding it to the study list without the need for a book. Defaults to 0%.
string.hint_maxChanceDiscover: Maximum chance per night to discover a new spell, adding it to the study list without the need for a book. Defaults to 10%.
string.hint_maxConsecutiveFailures: Maximum consecutive failures before automatically succeeding. Set to 0 for unlimited failures. Defaults to 3.
string.hint_autoNoviceLearning: Required skill difference to always succeed when learning spells. At 25, a difference of one skill tier is required - e.g. 50 in Destruction means you'll never fail at learning Novice or Apprentice level Destruction spells. Lowering this makes things easier overall. Defaults to 30.
string.hint_noviceLearningEnabled: When enabled, the difference between your skill in a school and the level of the spell you're trying to learn can result in an automatic success. The required difference to ensure this success is configurable below. Defaults to on.
string.hint_autoSuccessBypassesLimit: Spells learned via the above option do not count towards the daily limit and all eligible spells will be learned on rest. Defaults to on.
string.hint_dreadstareLethality: Base chance to overdose when consuming Dreadmilk. Defaults to 10%. Increased by your bloodstream toxicity.
string.hint_parallelLearning: Choose how many spells from the top of your list you will attempt to learn on each attempt. Keep in mind that when combined with drugs and a high max learning chance, this can be overpowered. It is recommended to turn off learning failure notifications when learning lots of spells to prevent failure message spam. 1 is default.
string.hint_harderParallel: When learning multiple spells at once, divide the chance to learn by the amount of spells being learned to help preserve a similar speed. Recommended, defaults to on.
string.hint_bonusScale: Multiplier applied to the roleplaying bonus to chance of learning/discovering. This means casting spells relevant to your study, hoarding relevant spell notes, sleeping or studying at the College and temples, consuming nootropics, etc. Default is 1.0. Raising this can make it unreasonably easy to learn spells.
string.hint_infoStudy: Current chance to learn a spell from books (rolled after next night). Cast spells of the same school to improve. (Displays 0 if study list is empty.)
string.hint_infoDiscover: Current chance to discover a new spell and add it to the study list on an eligible rest. Cast spells of your current school of interest, use potions, or collect more notes to improve.
string.hint_collectNotes: Whether or not to deconstruct removed or insta-learned books into notes. Keeping a large collection of spell notes improves the chances of learning and discovery. The number of notes generated depends on your skill in relation to the spell, with the maximum amount generated being equal in value to the base value of the book. Default is enabled.
string.hint_removeBooks: Whether or not to remove spell books from inventory when added, to prevent vanilla 'insta-learn'. Default is enabled. Only turn this off if you are also disabling the mod's Spell Learning functions above!
string.hint_preferedSchool: Set this to the school of magic you want to discover spells from. Default is Automatic, which uses your most cast school from that day.
string.hint_effortScaling: The way effort scales when rolling for successful learning. Default is Tough Start, which is harsher to those with poorer magical skills and less roleplaying bonus.
string.hint_export: Export/backup spell study list to FISS XML.
string.hint_import: Import/restore spell study list from FISS XML.
string.hint_customLocation: Click to mark the current location as your personal study. It will provide a learning bonus similar to temples, but not as much as the College. Click again to unset. This can also be set with the Attunement spell.
string.hint_studyInterval: How many days must pass between learning and discovery attempts. Default is 0.65.
string.hint_enthir: Whether or not Enthir and Tolfdir will keep a stock of items related to this mod. Defaults to yes.
string.hint_spawnItems: Whether or not items are added to loot lists, causing them to spawn as loot. Defaults to yes.
string.hint_tooDifficultDiff: The difference in skill tier required to automatically fail learning. Lowering this makes things harder overall. Default is 30 - at or below Destruction 20, you will fail to learn Destruction 50+ spells.
string.hint_tooDiffEnabled: When enabled, you can automatically fail to learn a spell if it's significantly above your current skill level. In this case you will automatically move to the next possible spell without penalty.
string.hint_deletionWarning: WARNING: Disabling mod will clear your spell research list, remove known mod spells and purge *ALL* non-permanent spell effects from your character! Use FISS backups to save your research list!
string.hint_potionBypass: When enabled, Dreadmilk will bypass enabled skill requirements. For example, with Dreadmilk a novice can attempt to learn a master spell even when they would otherwise be prevented from doing so. Defaults to on.
string.hint_cdrEnabled: When enabled, casting up to 100 spells will reduce the cooldown between learning and discovery attempts. Defaults to on.
string.hint_cdr: The maximum percentage by which the cooldown can be reduced. Defaults to 25%.
string.hint_maxFailsSucceeds: When enabled, reaching the maximum failure limit will cause you to succeed as long as it isn't prevented by something like the skill difference option. When off, the spell will be moved to the bottom of your list instead. Defaults to off.
string.hint_dynamicDiff: When enabled, the chance to learn a spell also depends on its own difficulty relative to your skill. Makes learning spells twice your magical skill level about twice as hard, or half your skill level about two times easier. Defaults to on.
string.hint_moveto_top: Moves the selected spell to the top of the list.
string.hint_moveto_bottom: Moves the selected spell to the bottom of the list.
string.hint_moveto_index: You can move the selected spell to any index that you choose.
string.hint_spell_commands: Select a command from list to execute on selected spell. Please don't misclick. These commands are not reversible.
string.hint_drug_status: Your current level of toxicity from consuming Dreadmilk and Shadowmilk. As it increases, so does the chance of overdose on consumption. Decreases over time with rest.
string.hint_tutor_status: Whether or not you have successfully recieved the bonus from the Summon Daedric Tutor spell for this learning period.
string.hint_attunement_status: Amount of spell learning attempts left before you can change your custom study location with the Attunement spell.
string.notification_cannot_attune: You can only attune once per week. Wait {0} day(s).
string.notification_already_attuned: You cannot attune to this environment or have already attuned here.
string.notification_dreadmilk_feels_bad_man: You feel a little better, but it's not enough...
string.notification_spirit_summon only at midni: The tutor's dark knowledge can only be shared at midnight...
string.notification_spirit_glimpsed: The dark whispers give a glimpse of the unfathomable...
string.notification_spirit_need_more_sudden: You suddenly feel an excruciating yearning for Dreadmilk...
string.notification_study_progress: You feel you've made some progress.
string.notification_studied_too_soon: Your mind isn't yet settled enough to do more research.
string.notification_study_no_notes: You can't study without any notes...
string.notification_study_no_spells: You don't have any spell ideas to research right now.
string.notification_study_trespassing: You'll surely be discovered if you stop to study here!
string.notification_study_swimming: You'll ruin your notes if you try to study here!
string.hint_learn_on_study: When enabled, using the 'Study' power will cause you to attempt to learn new spells off your spell list. Defaults to on.
string.hint_discover_on_study: When enabled, using the 'Study' power will cause you to attempt to discover a new spell, adding it to the study list without the need for a book. Defaults to on.
string.hint_learn_on_sleep: When enabled, sleeping in a bed will cause you to attempt to learn new spells off your spell list. Defaults to on.
string.hint_discover_on_sleep: When enabled, sleeping in a bed will cause you to attempt to discover a new spell, adding it to the study list without the need for a book. Defaults to on.
string.mcm_message_removed_items_reload: Done removing items from lists. Please save and reload.
string.mcm_message_multiple_consecutive_exclusi: Learning multiple spells at once and limiting maximum consecutive failures are mutually exclusive. Your settings have been changed accordingly.
string.hint_already_studied: Whether or not you have already recieved the bonus from using the 'Study' power this cycle.
string.hint_study_is_rest: Whether to use the Study power as a once-per-interval bonus or as a way to learn/discover. Defaults to no bonus, which uses it to learn/discover.
string.hint_max_notes_bonus: The highest possible total chance provided by school-specific notes in your inventory. If the study power is not used for learning or discovery, it will provide a bonus maxed at half of this value. Default is 33%.
string.hint_max_notes: The value of school-specific notes required to reach the above maximum bonus chance. If the study power is not used for learning or discovery, it will require 5 times this number of any notes to give its max modifier. Defaults to 750g.
string.notification_spell_not_added_notes: Already knew {0}. Tome deconstructed into {1} notes.
string.notification_spell_added_notes: {0} added to study list. Tome deconstructed into {1} notes.
string.notification_spell_not_added_studying_no: Already studying {0}. Tome deconstructed into {1} notes.
string.hint_notification_add_spell: Notifications when a new spell is added to the list by deconstructing a tome. Includes information about note addition if vanilla notification is off. Defaults to on.
string.hint_notification_add_note: Vanilla item add notification when adding notes to inventory. Disabled by default.
string.hint_notification_remove_book: Vanilla item removal notification when mod automatically removes spellbook. Disabled by default.
string.notification_spirit_summon_already: The tutor's dark knowledge cannot be understood again so soon...
string.hint_notification_error: Error messages. You shouldn't ever see these unless mods are misbehaving or have been removed. Defaults to on.
string.hint_notification_tutor: Notifications hinting at the effects of the Daedric Tutor spell. Defaults to on.
string.hint_notification_dreadmilk: Notifications regarding Dreadmilk, Shadowmilk, addiction, your blood toxicity, or overdose. Defaults to on.
string.hint_notification_study: Post-study notification. Note that this does not affect spell learning or discovery notifications. Defaults to on.
string.hint_notification_dream: Notifications if you have a dream when sleeping. Defaults to on. Turning off the notifications will not turn off the system.
string.hint_notification_too_soon: Notifications when you performed an action (e.g. sleeping or studying) too soon and couldn't use it to learn or discover new spells. Defaults to on.
string.hint_notification_moving_on: Notifications when your character skips a spell due to impossibility or reaching the maximum amount of failures. Defaults to on.
string.hint_notification_discover: Notifications when a new spell has been added to your list via the discovery system. Defaults to on.
string.hint_notification_learn_fail: Notifications when your character fails at learning a spell. Defaults to on.
string.hint_notification_learn: Notifications when your character successfully learns a spell. Defaults to on.
string.hint_notification_add_spell_fail: Notifications when a spell cannot be added to the research list because you already know it or are already studying it. When enabled, includes information about note addition if the vanilla notification is off. Defaults to on.
string.hint_notification_vanilla_add_spell: The game's default 'X added' notification when the character learns a new spell. Defaults to off.
string.hint_add_to_list: Whether or not unknown spells are added to the research list when a spell tome enters your inventory. Its tome will also be removed when this occurs to prevent vanilla 'insta-learning' from it. If you only want to use this mod's spell discovery features, turn this off. Defaults to on.
string.mcm_option_return_tomes: Give Back Removed Tome on Learn
string.hint_return_tomes: Whether or not spell tomes are returned to your inventory after you learn their spells. Can only return tomes that were removed while this option was enabled. Defaults to off.
string.hint_remove_only_unknown: When on, tomes for spells you already know will never be removed and won't generate any spell notes. Defaults to off. If you are using the return tomes option, this must be turned on.
string.notification_update_177_changed: [Spell Learning] Update has turned back on spell book removal.
